page.title: 01KING JAMES COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: { The Centre was opened in 1976.The idea was to combine{King James I {Comprehensive School}and the new {Community Centre. The Centre caters for all ages and all interests,from five years to ninety years,and from jewellery making to squash. The original idea for the Centre being established was for the{school pupils to{mix with the public during the {school day.}In practice this only happens on a few occasion,though the assistant manager Mr.Farrer is looking into ways in which this can be furthered. One of the problems the Centre faces is being compared with a small village hall and a large sports complex.
